Summary: scary, very close, enourmous. change colors and followed us for several mi morphing in shape by using its lights
divs: Sighting Detailsbefore i get started i have to say it is very hard for me to describe the events that took place without actually speaking in person to bring to life how scary and real this was for us we were followed for several miles with alot of things taking place as to what the space craft was doin and the manuvers it was making!!my girlfriend and i were driving north bound on rt 16 in nh in the area from dover to rochester nh it was around 7 pm as we were driving i noticed out my driverside window lights that apeared right over the tree tops and i noticed it was quite a large mass of lights configured in a sequenced way do to the glare from a light drizziling rain i rolled my window down and their it was i could see the metal type finish on the out side, it was traveling along at our speed in the sky above the trees approximately 60 mph it was gigantic with lots of lights going on and off some different in color all were square and at times it would use the lights to make it appear the the craft was a drifferent shape from time to time! i was scared to pull over so i kept driving my girlfriend was next to me aand when she looked out she screamed what is it i said i think a ufo and i think it's following us! well 2 miles later she was yelling out the window franticly scared stop following us go away so at that point we were convinced it was! through out the whole time it followed us it dissapeared twice once it sholt off and upwards fatster than anything i ever wittnessed with a flash and dissapeared as we kept driving looking around up in the sky through the windshield about 3 minutes later it rose up almost like from behind the trees to my left outside my drivers window again continuing to follow us it had a back in forth motion as it was staying right with us also dipping down a little and rising above the trees! as we approached a toll booth it went down behind the trees and dissapeared at the toll booth i pulled off the highway where i saw a state trooper and i jumped out and asked the trooper has anyone reported a ufo there was one just following us and dissapeared she looked at me like i had eight heads and said no! so i jumped back in my truck and kept going at the tree line was about to end and the sky opened up where theres a lowes it rose up from behind the trees again and followed us for a half mile as the tree line ended and we came around the corner where lowes came into sight it jumped higher in the sky and behind lowes further from us it then turned a burning bright red light hovered there for a few miutes and fizzeled out!
